meanings.definition: A type of tree with distinctive fan-shaped leaves.
meanings.sent1: The gingkos in the park provide shade with their unique leaves.
meanings.sent2: I love walking by the gingkos and admiring their beautiful foliage.
meanings.sent3: The gingkos in the forest were gossiping about the other trees.
meanings.sent4: The gingkos stood tall like guardians, their leaves reaching out like welcoming hands.
meanings.sent5: The gingkos rustled in the wind, their leaves dancing in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The seeds of the gingko tree, used in traditional medicine.
meanings.sent1: Some people believe that gingkos can improve memory when consumed.
meanings.sent2: The herbalist recommended gingkos to help with my cold.
meanings.sent3: The gingkos in the potion gave it a strange, nutty flavor.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a treasure chest, filled with gingkos of wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The gingkos were like tiny magic beans, promising healing and health.

meanings.definition: The leaves of the gingko tree, often used in herbal supplements.
meanings.sent1: I brewed a tea with gingkos to relax after a long day.
meanings.sent2: The herbal store sold various products containing gingkos.
meanings.sent3: The gingkos on the label made the supplement look more natural.
meanings.sent4: Herbalists praised the gingkos for their calming properties.
meanings.sent5: The gingkos added a touch of green to the herbal blend, enhancing its benefits.
